title: First solar project in Maharashtra under MSKVY 2.0 activated
description: The first solar energy project under the Mukhyamantri Saur Krishi Vahini Yojana 2.0 in Maharashtra has been activated in Dhondalgaon village, Chhatrapati Sambhajinagar district. The 3 KW project will provide daytime power supply to 1,753 farmers. Spread over 13 acres, it was developed within four and a half months.
